channel.title: [HELP] server stuff like how to change exp rate [HELP]
channel.description:
These are the things I need help with in order of how important i need them:
1:Changing exp rate (i have a source with no custom made objects, so kinda like a blank source) 2:Making a client of my own. not downloading anyone else's 3:Making custom items and how to add them to my server and make there stats 4:Changing where you start 5:How to change the grounding (if possible) (like making grass snow) 6:making areas. Like making some water grass and so you can walk on it without noclip 7:How to recolour items 8:This is a question: Is it possible to make a complete new area? like without changing water to grass, saying that how to add it to my server. 9:Making lunar in my client and where to put it in my files so i can use it in my client
With all of these I need to know where they go EXACTLY in my files. I am merel a beginning - moderate coder and if I need to download something please post the link.
I do NOT want any bs like: You spelled that wrong! I dunno. Umm... use search! DOESNT ANYONE KNOW WHERE THE SEARCH BUTTON IS!!
Thanks for your help IF you helped.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2q865fo.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:4, topic:275340”]1) AttackNPC method
2) Client Hacking section, Scarecrows’ tutorial
3) Models section, SilentCJ’s tutorial
4) Player class
5-9) Check the client sections[/quote]

DUDE IM A NOOB AT EDITING AND I MAYBE WANTED YOU TO COPY IT AND PUT IT HERE? OR PUT THE LINK HERE? I DIDNT GET THAT

item.title: [HELP] server stuff like how to change exp rate [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“walkineagle, post:5, topic:275340”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=363736.msg2762187#msg2762187 date=1240605912]

  1. AttackNPC method
  2. Client Hacking section, Scarecrows’ tutorial
  3. Models section, SilentCJ’s tutorial
  4. Player class
  5. Edit the textures using AuraDevil’s cache editor
    [/quote]

link pl0x[/quote]
